revised_title: Direct Transformation of Iodide of Allyle into Iodide of Propyle
tldr: The author investigates the direct transformation of iodide of allyle into iodide of propyle by reacting it with hydriodic acid gas. The resulting compound is analyzed and found to correspond with the composition of iodide of propyle. Further experiments confirm the formation of propylic alcohol from the iodide.
